verses.verse: And after <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things I saw <S%G1492><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> corners <S%G1137><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> holding <S%G2902><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> winds <S%G417><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> that the wind <S%G417><s%> should not blow <S%G4154><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> tree. <S%G1186><s%>

And I saw <S%G1492><s%> another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> ascending <S%G305><s%> from the east, <S%G395><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the seal <S%G4973><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%> and he cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> to the four <S%G5064><s%> angels, <S%G32><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> it was given <S%G1325><s%> to hurt <S%G91><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> and the sea, <S%G2281><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hurt <S%G91><s%> not the earth, <S%G1093><s%> neither <S%G3383><s%> the sea, <S%G2281><s%> nor <S%G3383><s%> the trees, <S%G1186><s%> till <S%G891><s%> we have sealed <S%G4972><s%> the servants <S%G1401><s%> of our God <S%G2316><s%> in their foreheads. <S%G3359><s%>

And I heard <S%G191><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of them which were sealed: <S%G4972><s%> and there were sealed <S%G4972><s%> an hundred <S%G1540><s%> and forty <S%G5062><s%> and four <S%G5064><s%> thousand <S%G5505><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> the tribes <S%G5443><s%> of the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Juda <S%G2455><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%> Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Reuben <S%G4502><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%> Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Gad <S%G1045><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%>

Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Aser <S%G768><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%> Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Nephthalim <S%G3508><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%> Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Manasses <S%G3128><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%>

Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Simeon <S%G4826><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%> Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Levi <S%G3017><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%> Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Issachar <S%G2466><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%>

Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Zabulon <S%G2194><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%> Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Joseph <S%G2501><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%> Of the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Benjamin <S%G958><s%> were sealed <S%G4972><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thousand. <S%G5505><s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5023><s%> I beheld, <S%G1492><s%> and, see, <S%G2400><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> number, <S%G705><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> nations, <S%G1484><s%> and kindreds, <S%G5443><s%> and people, <S%G2992><s%> and tongues, <S%G1100><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and before <S%G1799><s%> the Lamb, <S%G721><s%> clothed <S%G4016><s%> with white <S%G3022><s%> robes, <S%G4749><s%> and palms <S%G5404><s%> in their hands; <S%G5495><s%>

And cried <S%G2896><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Salvation <S%G4991><s%> to our God <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> sits <S%G2521><s%> on the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and to the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>

And all <S%G3956><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> round <S%G2943><s%> about <S%G2943><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and about the elders <S%G4245><s%> and the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts, <S%G2226><s%> and fell <S%G4098><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their faces, <S%G4383><s%> and worshipped <S%G4352><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Amen: <S%G281><s%> Blessing, <S%G2129><s%> and glory, <S%G1391><s%> and wisdom, <S%G4678><s%> and thanksgiving, <S%G2169><s%> and honor, <S%G5092><s%> and power, <S%G1411><s%> and might, <S%G2479><s%> be to our God <S%G2316><s%> for ever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

And one <S%G1520><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to me, What <S%G5101><s%> are these <S%G3778><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are arrayed <S%G4016><s%> in white <S%G3022><s%> robes? <S%G4749><s%> and from where <S%G4159><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> they?

And I said <S%G2046><s%> to him, Sir, <S%G2962><s%> you know. <S%G1492><s%> And he said <S%G2036><s%> to me, These <S%G3778><s%> are they which came <S%G2064><s%> out of great <S%G3173><s%> tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> and have washed <S%G4150><s%> their robes, <S%G4749><s%> and made <S%G3021><s%> them white <S%G3021><s%> in the blood <S%G129><s%> of the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> are they before <S%G1799><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and serve <S%G3000><s%> him day <S%G2250><s%> and night <S%G3571><s%> in his temple: <S%G3485><s%> and he that sits <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> shall dwell <S%G4637><s%> among <S%G1909><s%> them.

They shall hunger <S%G3983><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> more, <S%G2089><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> thirst <S%G1372><s%> any <S%G2089><s%> more; <S%G2089><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> shall the sun <S%G2246><s%> light <S%G4098><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> them, nor <S%G3761><s%> any <S%G3956><s%> heat. <S%G2738><s%>

For the Lamb <S%G721><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in the middle <S%G3319><s%> of the throne <S%G2362><s%> shall feed <S%G4165><s%> them, and shall lead <S%G3594><s%> them to living <S%G2198><s%> fountains <S%G4077><s%> of waters: <S%G5204><s%> and God <S%G2316><s%> shall wipe <S%G1813><s%> away <S%G1813><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> tears <S%G1144><s%> from their eyes. <S%G3788><s%>
